name: Nolgia
startIntroPart1: The Seven Lords, may you keep Nolgia strong. For thousand of years we built language and science.
declaringWar: May your treacherous life cease to exist until tomorrow.
attacked: You morron, no one can defeat Nolgish pride.
defeated: I'm sorry that such vulgar people have to rule over our dignity.
introduction: Koe, my friend. Welcome to the gates of our nation, Nolgia. I'm Bedyn Kulis, leader of Nolgia.
neutralYes: I don't see reason to refuse.
hateHello: I wish that you come with a purpose.
hateYes: Thank you for your consideration, I agree
afterPeace: I hope it's the last time.
